verses.roman:
ei-mate sārvabhaumera nistāra karila
dakṣiṇa-gamane prabhura icchā upajila

synonyms: ei-mate—in this way; sārvabhaumera—of Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya; nistāra—the liberation; karila—was executed; dakṣiṇa-gamane—in going to South India; prabhura—of the Lord; icchā—a desire; upajila—arose.
translation: After delivering Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya, the Lord desired to go to South India to preach.
